parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The start time of the SQL query. Specify the time in the UNIX timestamp format. The time must be in UTC. Unit: ms.

parameters.name: ExeTime
parameters.description: The SQL execution time. Unit: ms.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The end time of the SQL query. Specify the time in the UNIX timestamp format. The time must be in UTC. Unit: ms.
